name: Santa's Story of Christmas
description: Santaâ€™s Story of Christmas is a story-driven adventure game. Santa has been robbed and Christmas is in danger! You have to help him to save Christmas this year. Get into the right Christmas spirit and let a story be told, accompanied by a wonderful hand-drawn artwork and selected music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3 2xxx / AMD Phenom II X4 Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
